Docs.summary: Defines a pixel format for images and pixel-based surfaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *pixelFormat* One of the predefined pixel formats defined by the class. ## Examples The following example shows how to create a and find the value of its properties.
